entities.name: mafalda
entities.description: A small, ferrety-looking wizard who appeared before Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is talking to Mafalda and trying to stop him from reaching the street.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is creeping along behind Hermione and Mafalda.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also creeping along behind Hermione and Mafalda.

relationships.description: Harry is creeping along behind Hermione and Mafalda.
Ron is also creeping along behind Hermione and Mafalda.
Hermione yanked a handful of hairs from the top of Mafalda's head.
